content.question: Which of the following rhythmic patterns is played?

choices.label: The figure presents two measures of music in bass clef. The key signature has one flat and the time signature is 4/4.
The figure presents two measures of music in bass clef. The key signature has one flat and the time signature is 4/4.
The figure presents two measures of music in bass clef. The key signature has one flat and the time signature is 4/4.
The figure presents two measures of music in bass clef. The key signature has one flat and the time signature is 4/4.

content.answer: The figure presents two measures of music in bass clef. The key signature has one flat and the time signature is 4/4.

unit.text: 1: Music Fundamentals I - Pitch, Major Scales and Key Signatures, Rhythm, Meter, and Expressive Elements

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Use symbols and terms to describe features of rhythm in performed music, including meter, note values, and rhythmic patterns and devices.
